subject: Follow Up
description_text:
Following up on my email I sent regarding a parts Order I want to place.

Simsonn Support Team,

I want to order pieces of your

Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulator Pedal with Baseplate
Choose your pedal setup: Plus X P3-H3
Color: Silver

I need the left and right upright portions and the middle supports that the pedal plates screw into. I've attached a picture with the highlighted parts I need.

Assistance in this will be greatly appreciated.


Respectfully,
Josh Brown
 [facebook icon] <https://www.facebook.com/share/14tyJYsgwr/>   [linkedin icon] <https://www.linkedin.com/in/josh-brown-559566149?utm_source=share&utm_campaign=share_via&utm_content=profile&utm_medium=android_app>   [instagram icon] <https://www.instagram.com/josh.brown05?igsh=MXhkb2ZzNThkdGN3Yg==>

Email:
Joshua.Brown05@outlook.com<mailto:Josh.Brown75@outlook.com>
Mobile:
+1 (832) 797-7741
Address:
Temple, TX 76502

conversations.body_text: Hi Josh Brown,  Do you mean you’d like to purchase the colored metal parts shown in the picture? We’re sorry, but we don’t sell individual parts — only the complete assembled product.
ID 为 4561 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单4561

Hi Josh Brown,    You can use this $35 store promotion discount for your purchase, but it cannot be applied to individual accessories. If you need individual accessories, you will need to provide your previous order number.  Discount code: CNFRCS  Purchase link: https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals
